114415.お知らせ広場は プレイヤーから絵葉書を募集し\nオークション形式で 記事として\:
This is the first time I've ever seen a postcard on the Internet. Once posted, the same article can be viewed on any server, on
any continent... To enter, all you need is a postcard and some gold... Six postcards a day, in order of the amount of money bid,
will be published as articles. Each article will run for seven days... New articles will be posted as the date changes, so please stay
tuned...

114416.お知らせ広場に 応募したあとでも\n「応募をやめる」を 選択することで\n応募を:
You can cancel your application by selecting "Cancel Application" even after you have submitted it to the Announcement Square.
However, you can only cancel a postcard that was submitted up to four days before it was posted... If you wish to cancel a postcard
you have submitted, you will be charged a cancellation fee of <%dL_FEE>% of the bid amount...

114417.お知らせ広場に 絵葉書が掲載されたあとでも\n「掲載中の絵葉書を削除」を 選択す:
You can delete a postcard from your article by selecting "Delete Postcard" even after it has been posted in the Announcement Square.
Please note that even if you delete a postcard after it has been posted, you will not get back the gold that you bid on or the
gift certificate that you used... Please note that even if you delete a postcard after it has been posted, you will not be able to
return any of the gold you bid on or any of the notice coupons you used...

114418.お知らせ広場では 掲載されている各記事に\n「いいね！」を することができます。:
In the Notification Square, you can "Like" each article that is posted. The author of the article with the most "Likes" out of 6 will
receive an "Notification Coupon" from the management team. If you use the "Notification Coupon", your article will be published for
free, and you may see more articles published by people you support. If you like a postcard, please "Like" it to support the creator.

114419.同じ掲載開始日に 応募された\n絵葉書の中で 入札金額が多いものから６枚が\n記:
The first six postcards with the highest bids from among the postcards submitted on the same date will be published in the News
Square... The first six postcards with the highest bid amount will be published in the News Square. If you use the "Notice Ticket",
your entry will be... If the content of the postcard is inappropriate, the postcard will not be published. Please use the bulletin
board with good manners...

114420.お知らせ広場は プレイヤーから絵葉書を募集し\nオークション形式で 記事として\:
This is the first time I've ever seen a postcard on the Internet. Once posted, the same article can be viewed on any server, on
any continent... To enter, all you need is a postcard and some gold... Six postcards a day, in order of the amount of money bid,
will be published as articles. Each article will run for seven days... New articles will be posted as the date changes, so please stay

114421.お知らせ広場に 応募するには\n「応募する」を選択して 「タイトル」「絵葉書」\:
To apply for a postcard, select "Apply" and enter the title, postcard, start date, and bid amount. For the start date, you can set
the date from 5 days to 12 days in the future. If your article is not selected, you will be refunded the full amount of your
bid... Please note that refunds may take some time. If your postcard is chosen for an article and it gets a lot of likes... If your
postcard is selected, it will be posted on the Top 10 board... If your postcard is selected for the Top 10 board, you will be
able to receive a "Twist! If your article is selected as one of the Top 10, it will be posted on the Twist! Once your article is
posted on the Top 10 board, you will be able to collect Please note that when we send you gold, we charge a 5% handling fee. Please note that we charge a 5% handling fee for sending gold...

114422.トップ１０掲示板は 応募された最近の記事から\n「いいね！」を多く獲得した記事を:
The Top 10 Board is a bulletin board where you can see a ranking of the articles that have received the most "Likes" from recent
submissions. from the most recent articles submitted, and you can see the ranking of the articles. And for the ranked articles, we
will give you You can give any amount of money from 100 to 10,000 G for any amount from 100 to 10000 G. During the Top 10
period, if you give any article a "Twist! to any article during the Top 10 period, you will receive 5 lucky draw tickets! However,
you can only get one coupon per article, and you can get it again when the next Top 10 is updated... If you find an article that you
like, please give it to the contributor!

295970.<color_yellow>\nただいま １０周年のお祝いとして\n特別なキャン:
We are now running a special campaign to celebrate our 10th anniversary! Like our Notification Square and
Top 10 Bulletin Board articles and receive a Lottery Ticket! Notification Square articles will only be given out once per day of
publication. Like! You may only "Like" one article or multiple articles once. Top 10 Bulletin Board articles will be given away
once per article. The Top 10 Bulletin Board will give you one "Ohinari! can <%sM_OHINERI_10TH> with <%dM_GOLD_10TH> gold
only once per posting period, apart from <%sM_OHINERI_10TH>. You will receive <%sM_ITEM_10TH> for <%sM_OHINERI_10TH>! For
more details, please refer to the "10th Anniversary Campaign" in the "View Description" command!

295974.お知らせ広場や トップ１０掲示板の記事に\n「いいね！」をすると ふくびき券が\:
You can win Lottery Tickets by "Liking" Notification Square and Top 10 Bulletin Board articles. Up to 6 Notification Square articles
will be published per day, and you can get Lottery Ticket <%dM_HIROBA_NUM> for liking any of the articles! you will receive
<%dM_HIROBA_NUM> Lottery Ticket as a reward! You can get one reward for each day of publication. Like! You will only receive one
reward for each article you "Like", whether you like one or all six articles. Also, if you "Like" an article in the Top 10 you will
receive <%dM_TOP_NUM> Lottery Ticket per article! If you like an article, like it more and more! and support the creator of the
postcard.

295975.トップ１０掲示板では 「おひねり！」とは別に\n掲載期間につき１回のみ <%nM:
On the Top 10 Board, Ohineri!" You can <%sM_OHINERI_10TH> for <%dM_GOLD_10TH> gold only once per listing period. You will receive
<%sM_ITEM_10TH> for <%dM_ITEM_10TH_NUM> as a reward for doing <%sM_OHINERI_10TH>! A bonus for postcard contributors! as well as the gold
collected by <%sM_OHINERI_10TH> will be sent together. If you find an article of particular interest, why not give the contributor a
little more with <%sM_OHINERI_10TH>?
